attributes.action: Bring back the death penalty in hopes to bring more fear to criminals/murderers.
attributes.additional_details: The countries a mess and everyone’s killing each other like it’s a third world country.
attributes.background: Bring back the death penalty. Murders and knife crime are through the roof because of the lack of punishment In this country.

rejection.details:
Capital punishment for those convicted of terrorism, murder or intentional harm
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/737624
